amendment.description: To provide necessary expenses for return to flight activities associated with the space shuttle and to provide that funding for such expenses is designated as emergency spending.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3250 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3250 proposed by Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S12723-12728, S12739-12741, S12748; text: CR S12723) To provide necessary expenses for return to flight activities associated with the space shuttle and to provide that funding for such expenses is designated as emergency spending.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3250 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3250 proposed by Senator Mikulski.
